EmailTemplate.description: Inform Partner Candidate that we have adequate partner coverage in their identified customer regions, so we are not looking to add on additional dealers
EmailTemplate.name: Partner Application Denied - Adequate Dealer Representation in Region
EmailTemplate.subject: Information Regarding your SunPower Partner Application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for your interest in joining SunPower's industry leading network of partners.
At this time SunPower is not looking to bring on additional partners in your geographic region.
We would like to keep your information on file for future consideration if we decide to bring on additional partners in your regional market.
Once again, we thank you for your time.
Regards,
{!User.FirstName}
SunPower Customer Care Team Email: customercare@sunpowercorp.com Phone: 1-800-SUNPOWER (1800-786-7693) www.sunpowercorp.com
